input.sentences: we had a fun night out last night .
everyone had a great time at during our time out .
the bonfire was majestic and illuminated the entire area !
they had great chocolates here | we enjoyed them greatly .
the lighting fixture was amazing | this is such a great place .
output.sentences: A group of friends went out for a night full of fun to celebrate their best friend's new engagement.
They wanted to spend time catching up with each other.
The restaurant they visited was majestic, with a firenpit that illuminated the entire venue.
Each of them greatly enjoyed the chocolates that the manager gave to them on the house.
Outside by the back, the manager showed them into a private VIP section with a unique lighting fixture that was simple amazing.
